about_the_game:
Echo of the Waves is a poetic and atmospheric watercolor-painted exploration game where you play music to interact with nature. You play as Zephyr, a young cartographer-musician from a distant ocean, set on an altruistic journey to discover and preserve an ancestral bond with a powerful and wondrous nature. Play music and use your observation skills to find your way through the colorful islands of Zephyr's archipelagos and uncover the many secrets hidden in the nature all around you.

Key features


  • Immerse yourself in beautifully handpainted watercolor environments which come alive with a unique 2.5D layered effect, transporting you into an interactive painting.
  • Manipulate your point of view, shifting between layers of the world, to discover hidden portals and cryptic symbols.
  • Use Zephyr's musical instrument to connect with nature and unveil unexpected magic, from awakening dormant creatures to unveiling hidden pathways.
  • Document your journey and encounters with Zephyr's notebook, creating a personal record of your adventure.
